thread.title: For Multinational Firms, Brazil Becomes a Pain in the Wallet
thread.title_full: For Multinational Firms, Brazil Becomes a Pain in the Wallet - WSJ

author: Maxwell Murphy
title: For Multinational Firms, Brazil Becomes a Pain in the Wallet
text:
As many multinational companies close their third-quarter books in coming weeks, their finance chiefs are likely to face a stark reality: the weakest results coming out of Brazil in over a decade.
Medical-device maker Medtronic PLC is more worried about the political and economic turmoil in Brazil, the world’s eighth largest economy, than the worsening slowdown in China, while chemical manufacturer FMC Corp. is “aggressively” paring... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
